ja403:8.2: yācañhi yācati → yācaṃpi yācati (s2, s3) | yācāni yācati (pts1) | yācanaṃ yācati (mr) | yācati yācanaṃ (bj -nissya)
ja403:9.1: Na ve dessanti → na ve dissanti (bj) | na ve dussanti (s2, s3) | na ve dissanti (pts1) | na videssanti (mr aṭṭha.)
ja403:9.4: Vada tvaṃ → vara taṃ (bj) | vara (s2, s3) | vara tvaṃ (pts1), bhaññamicchasi → bhaññitamicchasi (s2, s3) | yaññamicchasi (?)
